sentences.sContent: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.sCn: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.sContent: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.sCn: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.sContent: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.sCn: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.sContent: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.sCn: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

remMethod.val: 来自prefer(v. 喜爱， 喜欢)

words.tran: 优先的；选择的；特惠的；先取的

trans.tranOther: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can
